doc:
Jay Tarses https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jay_Tarses 0 Michael Jay Tarses (born July 3, 1939) is an American television comedy writer and producer. He created and produced The Days and Nights of Molly Dodd and The Slap Maxwell Story, co-created Buffalo Bill (with Tom Patchett), and was an executive producer for The Bob Newhart Show. His daughter is Jamie Tarses, former ABC Entertainment chief and current partner in the Pariah production company. Michael_Jay_Tarses ( born July_3_,_1939 ) is an_American_television_comedy_writer_and_producer . He created_and_produced The_Days_and_Nights of Molly_Dodd and The_Slap_Maxwell_Story , co-created_Buffalo_Bill_( with Tom_Patchett_) , and was an_executive_producer for The_Bob_Newhart_Show . His_daughter is Jamie_Tarses , former_ABC_Entertainment_chief_and_current_partner in the_Pariah_production_company .
